item.title: Brian Behlendorf: Apache co-founder talks about open source
item.quote: "the fact that we don't have a multibillion-dollar marketing organization means that, sure, Microsoft is going to be able to claim things or do things that we can't, but that hasn't hurt us so far."

item.title: Apache founders hit Vegas in search of cash
item.quote: "Behlendorf said the ASF may need to look for a little cash to keep up with the demands that developing the leading Web server requires"
